import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import { API } from '../../../../config' import { emptyCart } from '../../../reducer/cartActions' import Footer from '../../Footer' import Navbar from '../../Navbar' const Cart = () => { const cart_items = useSelector(state=> state.cart.cart_items ) const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart_totals = cart_items?.map(item=> item.product_price * item.quantity) const total_amount = cart_totals.length>0 && cart_totals.reduce((a, b)=> a + b) const emptyTheCart = () =>{ Swal.fire("Alert", "Are you sure you want to clear the cart?", "question") .then(result=> { if(result.isConfirmed){ } }) } return ( <>

Cart Items

{cart_items.length > 0 ? { cart_items && cart_items.map((item, i)=> { return }) }
S.No. Prodct Image Product Name Unit Price Quantity Total Price Action
{i + 1} {item.product_name} Rs. {item.product_price}
{item.quantity}
Rs. {item.quantity * item.product_price}
Cart Total: Rs.{total_amount}
:
No Items in Cart
}
) } export default Cart
